-- | An FFI interface to the DevIL library
--   
--   Provides a very simple interface to the DevIL image library. Provides
--   functions readImage and writeImage, which can read and write many
--   image formats from/to an RGBA array of values to work with.
@package Codec-Image-DevIL
@version 0.2.3

module Codec.Image.DevIL
ilInit :: IO ()

-- | Reads an image into an RGBA array. Indices are
--   (row,column,color-channel).
readImage :: FilePath -> IO (UArray (Int, Int, Int) Word8)

-- | Writes an RGBA array to a file. Indices are
--   (row,column,color-channel).
writeImage :: FilePath -> UArray (Int, Int, Int) Word8 -> IO ()

-- | Write an image from a pointer to raw RGBA data. Careful! The size
--   tuple is (rows, columns), not (width, height).
writeImageFromPtr :: FilePath -> (Int, Int) -> Ptr Word8 -> IO ()
